title: Proper splittings and projectivity for good moduli spaces
authors: Dori Bejleri and Elden Elmanto and Matthew Satriano
abstract:
We show that any good moduli space $\pi : \mathcal{X} \to Y$ has a splitting
after a proper, generically finite covering of $Y$. As an application we
generalize Koll\'ar's ampleness lemma to give a criterion for projectivity of a
good moduli space.
